programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E01, A newly regenerated Doctor is taken to the Rani's base by Urak the Tetrap, while Mel meets some of the Lakertyans - and falls into one of the Rani's traps.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E02, The Rani's impersonation of Mel backfires badly because Urak can't tell the difference, while the Doctor attempts to learn the secret of the Loyhargil.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E03, The furious Rani begins to slaughter the Lakertyans, so Mel rallies the survivors, while the Doctor is readied to donate his mind to the Rani's grotesque experiment.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who Time and the Rani, S07E04, As Mel convinces the Lakertyans fight back, the Tetraps turn on the Rani and the Doctor ensures the missile is deflected away from the asteroid.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E01, The Doctor and Mel end up in South Wales along with an assassin and his intended victim...

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E02, Gavrok and the Bannermen have arrived on Earth, searching for Delta and slaughter the holidaymakers without compunction to draw her out.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Delta and the Bannermen, S07E03, As Billy and Ray do what they can to help save Delta and the baby, the Doctor and Goronwy the beekeeper face Gavrok and his Bannermen one last time...

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E01, Mel and the Doctor are in for a cool reception on the trading colony Iceworld, where they discover excitable teenage waitress Ace, space maverick Sabalom Glitz, and legends of dragons and treasure.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E02, The time travellers, accompanied by Glitz and Ace, search the ice caves for the treasure which is supposed to be guarded by a fearsome dragon. Little do they are leading Kane straight to it.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Dragonfire, S01E03, Having sold their souls to him years ago, Kane's disaffected staff plot to kill him. Meanwhile, he plots to obtain the dragon's treasure so he can escape from Iceworld and wreak havoc once more.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E01, In Shoreditch, 1963, the Doctor’s past begins to catch up with him at the Totter’s Lane junkyard where his adventures began - and to where an old terror is returning.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E02, Renegade Daleks battle Imperial Daleks for control of the Hand of Omega and Ace takes them on single-handedly at Coal Hill School, while Ratcliffe makes his move.

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E03, The Doctor discovers the difference between the two Dalek factions and why they want a stellar manipulator. He hopes Captain Gilmore's people are up to the task ahead.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Remembrance of the Daleks, S01E04, The streets of East London shake under a civil war bering fought between the Daleks, as the Doctor forces the Dalek Emperor to reveal himself to be Davros, waging one last battle.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E01, As UNIT is transporting a nuclear warhead around Carbury, knights in armour arrive to continue waging a war that began thousands of years ago, but in a wholly different dimension.

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E02, The Doctor and Ace explore King Arthur’s spaceship deep under Lake Vortigern, while Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart arrives in Carbury where he encounters Morgaine...

programme.title: Part 3
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E03, Furious at her inability to find and engage Arthur in battle, Morgaine threatens to unleash the Destroyer upon the planet unless the Doctor gives her what she wants.

programme.title: Part 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Battlefield, S01E04, The Brigadier slays the Destroyer while Morgaine takes control of UNIT's nuclear warhead and prepares to start a countdown that will destroy Earth forever.

programme.title: The Dead Planet
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E01, The travellers venture out on to the surface of a new world. Everything is dead but beyond a petrified jungle, they see a huge metal city which the Doctor is determined to explore.

programme.title: The Survivors
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E02, Looking for Barbara - the Doctor, Ian, and Susan discover that they have exposed to lethal doses of radiation. The travellers are confronted by the city’s inhabitants – the Daleks!

programme.title: The Escape
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E03, Fearful of a Thal attack, the Daleks force Susan to trick the Thals. Realising that the Daleks’ are planning an ambush, the four travellers try to escape and warn the Thals.

programme.title: The Ambush
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E04, Pretending to be a Dalek, Ian finds that he is trapped inside the casing. The Doctor, Susan, and Barbara have no choice but to abandon Ian as the real Daleks arrive and attack.

programme.title: The Expedition
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E05, Ian and Barbara join a Thal expedition that will penetrate the Dalek city from the unguarded mountains behind it. Their journey is a dangerous one and not all will survive.

programme.title: The Ordeal
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E06, The Doctor and Susan are once again taken prisoner by the Daleks. In the mountains, Ian, Barbara, and the Thals must negotiate a vast chasm to reach the city.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Daleks, S01E07, The Thals and the time travellers attack the Daleks from all sides as the Daleks start the countdown to release deadly doses of radiation into the atmosphere.

programme.title: Planet of the Giants
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: Planet of Giants, S01E01, The crew arrive in a place where everything is on a giant scale, the result of the TARDIS doors malfunctioning. They are soon made acutely aware of the nefarious plans of a ruthless businessman and his misguided scientist.

programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E09, Hallmark Original Series. A determined Jack properly asks Elizabeth for a dinner date.

August Creek, 20170807000000 +0000, Erica (Courtney Ford) left her Iowa hometown after she lost her soldier husband, but three years later she returns for her sister's wedding and has to face the love she left behind.

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E11, When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E12, A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Proving Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E13, Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E14, During a pursuit by the Goa'uld gliders, Teal'c fails to make it through the Stargate before it is destroyed. Now SG-1 has only 48 hours to reestablish Teal'c's energy signature from the temporary memory of the Stargate before it's erased…for good!

programme.title: Summit
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E15, A truce is declared among the Goa'uld, so that the warlords can attend a summit on the future of universe domination. As Jackson speaks fluent Goa'uld, he is sent to the summit disguised as an aide. But his real mission is to poison the delegates!

programme.title: Last Stand
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E16, Embattled and under siege, SG-1 attempts to escape a Goa'uld search and destroy mission bent on finding them and the secret crystal they carry. Meanwhile, the balance of life is threatened by the reappearance of the evil System Lord Anubis.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E17, As an asteroid hurtles toward Earth, SG-1 uses an abandoned Goa'uld ship as a launch pad for a mega-bomb designed to destroy the rock before impact. But when SGC loses the ship's signal, it's feared that the team is dead and that Earth is in peril.

programme.title: The Warrior
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E18, K'tano, former First Prime of the late Imhotep, is now the leader of a powerful Jaffa rebellion. SG-1 visits his stronghold in hopes of securing an alliance. But O'Neill soon learns that this strategic partnership may well come at a heavy price.

programme.title: Menace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E19, A dormant female android discovered on a barren planet is transported back to Earth for study. On reactivation, she exhibits a childlike innocence. But soon, SG-1 discovers that this seemingly innocent being may hold a dangerous secret.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E20, Col. O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) must enlist the aid of a couple of convicted felons in a bid to save a planet from the Goa'uld. With an attack looming, an entire world's salvation rests in the hands of SG-1 and two former NID operatives.

programme.title: Meridian
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E21, Exposed to a lethal dose of radiation, Jackson has just hours to live. SG-1 tries everything in its power to save him, but as the hours tick away, Jackson's spirit meets with each member individually to discuss his next mission: life after death.

programme.title: Revelations
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E22, Still dealing with the death of one of their own, SG-1 must put its mourning aside in order to confront the warlord Anubis—who has captured the Asgard leader Thor so he can extract the secrets of their ancient technology for universal domination.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.
